R condition messages

Source: R/pkgsnip.gen.R
data_msgs.Rd

A tibble with all R condition messages included in this package, together with their id. The latter can be fed to msg().

Usage

data_msgs

Format

A tibble with the columns id and value.

Details

Currently, R condition messages with the following ids and arguments are available:

idarguments
pkg_requiredpkg

See also

R message functions msg()
